products.title: Wondrous Deep Repair Mask 1L
products.body_html:
The Latest Hair Wonder. 

This Deep Repair Hair Mask Treatment is packed with full of goodies to tackle all hair issues. Acai Oil provides moisture and shine. Quinoa and Brazil Nut extracts improves hair texture as they repair, nourish and strengthen the hair.

WHAT IT DOES
• Provides Moisture and Shine
• Repairs and strengthens.
• Nourishes.

Apply after shampooing to towel dried hair. Leave in for 3-5 minutes. Rinse well.

Acai Oil 

  • Provides moisture and with luminous shine.

Quinoa and Brazil Nut Extracts

  • Improves hair texture as they repair, nourish and strengthen the hair.

products.title: J2 Instant Repair Leave-In Hair Masque 50ml
products.body_html:
The Latest Jeval J2 Instant Repair Leave-In Hair Masque. 

The new and innovative J2 Masque from Jeval is designed to repair hair bonds from the inside with a new plant-based “proprietary protein blend (PPB)”. This advanced scientific formula provides instant results to renew hair strength and elasticity while nourishing and hydrating the outer layers of the hair.

 WHAT IT DOES
• Prevents colour fade.
• Improves strength & elasticity.
• Works in 4 minutes.

Apply 1- 2mls of J2 to towel dried hair after shampooing – do not use conditioner. Apply to the ends of hair first, then work through the mid lengths. Evenly distribute by running hair between fingers for 2-3 minutes. Comb through and let sit for another minute for J2 to activate. Do not rinse. Style as usual.

products.title: Flare Cyber Grape Masque 300ml
products.body_html:
The Jeval Flare Cyber Grape Masque is a rich blue-violet that will enhance deep purple tones and intensify any existing deep purple colours.


*Can be used to remove some orange or brassy tones on yellow hair but not recommended for use on clean blondes as it will over-tone with purple hues

Enriched with natural oils, vitamin E and olive butter, hair is left nourished and revitalised.

Step 1 Shampoo your hair with Jeval Don’t Go Changing colour care shampoo, then rinse.

Step 2 Apply your choice of Flare Shampoo and massage throughout the hair, leave for 3 to 5 minutes.

Step 3 Leave in hair longer if the additional colour intensity is required.

Step 4 Rinse with cool water and follow with your favourite Jeval conditioner or Flare masque for greater vibrancy and condition.

products.body_html:
Refresh & enhance all tones in coloured and natural hair with the New Jeval Flare Cyber Grape Shampoo. This rich blue-violet will enhance deep purple tones and intensify any existing deep purple colours

Infused with argan oil to leave the hair feeling nourished with weightless hydration.

*Can be used to remove some orange or brassy tones on yellow hair but not recommended for use on clean blondes as it will over tone with purple hues

products.title: Dream Cream Leave-In Detangling Treatment 200ml
products.body_html:
The Jeval Dream Cream Leave-In Detangling Treatment!

At Last! The product your hair has dreamt about! This amazing leave-in cream does it all. The active ingredients derived from fruit extracts and milk protein detangles all hair types, prevent split ends, repair the hair and control frizz. It provides UV and heat protection while adding body and shine.

Just perfect. A dream come true!

products.title: Clean Slate Clarifying Shampoo 400ml
products.body_html:
It's time to wipe the slate clean. A fresh start with this deep yet gentle cleanser. Removes product, mineral salts & excess oil from the hair. Clean slate!

This versatile deep cleansing shampoo aids in removing product build-up and silicones from the hair. Excellent to use after swimming to demineralise the hair preventing green pool hair.

Exceptional to remove oils while remaining gentle on the scalp thanks to the natural blend of Liquorice and Peppermint extracts.

Suitable for:

Excellent before salon chemical services to remove impurities, product and silicone build-up. 

Apply to wet hair. Lather from roots to ends. Rinse thoroughly. Repeat if necessary.

LICORICE
Hydrating and strengthening giving your hair a natural shine.

PEPPERMINT
Anti-inflammatory

products.title: Scalp Ninja Anti-Dandruff Shampoo 400ml
products.body_html:
This warrior will slay away scalp irritation and flakes. The gentle formulation of tea tree and lemon makes it suitable for everyday use. Won't hurt your colour either.

Apply to wet hair and lather roots to ends. Leave for up to 2 minutes. Rinse well. Repeat if necessary. Follow with a Jeval conditioner appropriate to your hair.

Key Ingredients: Tea tree and lemon

products.title: Icy Treat Blonde Leave-In Toning Mousse 200ml
products.body_html:
Like Marshmallow but Cooler! Jeval Icy Treat Leave-in Blonde Toning Reconstructor Mousse is a multi-use cool toned leave-in mousse formula with sunflower seed oil that combines milk proteins, vitamin E and Pro-vitamin B5 to penetrate and strengthen the hair. The blue/violet pigments contained within allowing instant toning to pre-lightened, natural grey and blonde hair. Use as a quick leave-in treatment, a porosity equaliser, or even mix with blonde colours to intensify the toning effect.

An Icy Treat for All Blondes.

Features

  • Leave-in blonde toning mousse
  • Leave-in treatment
  • Porosity equaliser
  • Paraben free
  • Ideal for pre-lightened, grey and blonde hair
  • Infused with sunflower seed oil, milk proteins, Vitamin E, Pro-vitamin B5

Shake the can before use. Hold upside down to dispense.

Leave-in Cool Toning Reconstructor Mousse: massage a marshmallow-sized dollop on clean, towel-dried hair.

Porosity Equaliser: use on dry or damp hair before toning. Apply 5ml (approx. 2 marshmallows) then proceed with toning service.

Mixed with Permanent Blonde Colours: Icy Treat will increase the volume of the product and add cool tones, strength and shine to hair. Follow colour instructions, add 5ml (approx. 2 marshmallows) mix with the colour, and apply evenly to hair. Process as per colour directions and rinse off.

Ingredients

Aqua (Water), Propane, Myristyl Alcohol, Butane. Cetrimonium chloride, Isobutane, Parfum (Fragrance), Amodimethicone, Phenerhyl alcohol, Caprylyl Glycol, Triethanolamine, Disodium EDTA, Acid Violet 43, Trideceth-10, Tocopheryl Acetate, Butylene glycol, Panthenol, Propylene glycol, Helianthus annuus (Sunflower) seed extract, PEG-5 condominium methosulfate, Sodium glutamate, Hydrolyzed milk protein, Hydroxypropyltrimonium hydrolyzed casein, Sodium cocoyl glutamate, Hydroxypropyl guar hydroxypropyltrimonium chloride.

products.title: Dark Art Revitalising Charcoal Shampoo and Treatment
products.body_html:
Jeval Dark Art Revitalising Charcoal Shampoo

This revitalising shampoo gently deep cleanses the hair and scalp unclogging pores as it removes excess sebum to stimulate healthy hair growth and removes free radicals leaving the hair shiny.

Suitable for :
- Daily use
- Colour safe
- Brilliant for oily scalps
- Those working in a daily dusty and dirty work environment.

Jeval Dark Art Revitalising Charcoal Treatment

This luxurious revitalising hair treatment removes free radicals promoting hair well-being. Hair is revitalised, strengthened and left feeling smooth and soft with brilliant shine.

Suitable for:

- Strengthening and revitalising the hair
- Promotes hair manageability and hair health
- Restores shine by smoothing the cuticle
- Excellent alternative for oily scalps with dry ends
- Great for young adolescents challenged with oily issues

products.title: Infusions Argan Oil Treatment 100ml
products.body_html:
This natural hair care "Jeval Infusions Argan Oil Treatment" brings life to frizzy, flyaway, dry and damp hair. This botanical Moroccan Argan Oil, not just repairs and strengthens the hair but also conditions hair to add softness and shine.

This conditioning and nourishing " Argan Oil" from Jeval Infusions is enriched with botanical ingredients and contains no sulphates or parabens.

products.title: Infusions Argan Oil & Hemp Seed Smooth It 200ml
products.body_html:
This gentle and natural hair care "Jeval Infusions Smooth It " cream brings life to frizzy, flyaway and dry hair by adding extra moisture. This wonderful and kind enough-to-your-hair formula not just seals protects and repairs hair cuticles but offers lasting curl definition, optimal lifestyle activity and support as well.

This nourishing "SMOOTH IT" cream from Jeval Infusions has been made from botanical-rich ingredients and contains no sulphates or parabens.
